author: Aidan
title: PlayerMint P2: MetaVerse Toolkit
description: A MetaVerse is forming, yet it does not have an economic backbone that allows its users to own the digital assets they interact with.
solution: Creating an economic toolkit on Cardano so that MetaVerse users can earn, mint, and trade digital assets.
experience: Our team of 4 has a combined 45 years of experience in gaming and 10 years in blockchain. We've worked with EMURGO, E3, IGN, and IDG/GamePro
